message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you showing me the product. I'm interested, but I'm only able to pay $12000 at this time. Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
